name: canshare-who5-endo-neuroendo-pituitary-net-histology
title: NZ WHO pituitary neuroendocrine tumour primary histology (5th edition)
description: Histologies used for endocrine and Neuroendocrine cancer types (WHO Classification of Tumours, Endocrine and Neuroendocrine Tumours, 5th edition) 2. Pituitary tumours section Anterior pituitary neuroendocrine tumours (PitNETs).
